name: (R) Best HP FS (Other Fossil Heat, No Cool)
_description: Best available air source heat pump fully replacing original fuel/oil/propane equipment, no existing cooling.

notes: COP = SEER / 3.412, COP = HSPF / 3.412 (see EIA source)
split system conversion factors SEER2/SEER = 0.95, HSPF2/HSPF = 0.85 (see RESNET source)

notes: Retail (new) and total installed (existing) for 'High' ASHPs in 2023
For existing buildings, added costs of $6300 are the average of the cost range for circuit breaker panel upgrade and home service upgrade costs in the NV5 report
a new circuit cost of 700 $2022 using the upper bound (assuming a high amperage 240V circuit is required for the HVAC system) from the NV5 report
and additional tank removal costs of 800 2014$ (975 2022$) are applied for distillate and propane based on the 2015 EIA report, updating the cost from April 2014 to April 2022.

market_scaling_fractions_source.notes: Heating multiples determined as proportions of total homes with non-NG fossil-based heating that DO NOT have cooling systems in each BA climate zone. Cooling multiple zeroes out cooling segment.
